definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

pinyin: pi2 hua2 ting3 ji1 liu2 hui2 xuan2

sentences.chinese: 今年他又喜欢上了划艇。

sentences.english: The person sitting on the wherry is my old classmate.
sentences.chinese: 那个坐在划艇上的人是我的老同学。

sentences.english: The captain used the dinghy to go from the ship to the shore.
sentences.chinese: 船长用小划艇离船靠岸。

sentences.english: The rough waves capsized the rowboat .
sentences.chinese: 汹涌的波涛掀翻了划艇。

sentences.english: Dispatch, we have the kayakers on board and are transporting them back to base.
sentences.chinese: 调度，我们找到了船上的皮划艇运动员，并运回基地。

sentences.english: Police recovered their inflatable boat east of the rapids the next day.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，警察在急流东侧发现他们仍未漏气的皮划艇。

sentences.english: Rowboats and canoes are often found on fairly placid lakes and streams.
sentences.chinese: 划艇和独木舟往往被发现在平静的湖泊和河流中。

sentences.english: A few brave Angelenos even kayak on it.
sentences.chinese: 一些勇敢的洛杉矶人甚至在河上滑行皮划艇。

sentences.english: The Havard Boat Club has come off with flying colors in a competition with the Yale Boat Club.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大学皮划艇队在比赛在中击败了耶鲁大学。

sentences.english: Bill ranked second in the semifinal of C-1,500 meters.
sentences.chinese: 比尔在500米单人划艇比赛半决赛中名列第二。

sentences.english: The rowboat race won't begin until tomorrow, but the players have already itching to start today.
sentences.chinese: 明天划艇比赛才开始，今天选手就跃跃欲试了。

sentences.english: Can I hire a rowing boat?
Rowing is also a kind of competitive game.
sentences.chinese: 划艇也是一项竞技性比赛。

sentences.english: My father would take his outboard motor along and rent a rowboat.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲会带着他的舷外马达并租用一个划艇。

sentences.english: Native Americans used canoes to travel on rivers.
sentences.chinese: 美洲原住居民用皮划艇在河上来往。

sentences.english: Then I got into my rowboat for the last time.
sentences.chinese: 然后我跳上划艇准备作最后一次努力。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
to dive/to go under water/(in an online forum) to lurk
